name: Roullete-plat
description:
Roullette-plat
Now it's time to welcome the new platFormer game.

Friendly paddy fields, green cities, huge universes,
Relaxing sea, you can travel to cool mountains!
Clear the course as soon as possible and compete with your friends for a record.
Find your own way to find shortcuts through various topics. 
You can meet other maps and items with roulette!

-Various maps
-Simple Control
-An item with various effects suitable for the theme.


-Leader board connected to SNS
-More maps and more items
-bug Fix
